text: قال يقوم انى لكم نذير مبين

translations.translation: He said: "O my people, I warn you clearly
Noah said: “My people, I have certainly been sent as a clear warner to you,
Noah said, "My people, I am warning you plainly.
He said, “O my people! I am indeed a Herald of clear warnings to you.”
He said: "O my people! Verily, I am a plain warner to you,"
He said: O my people! Surely I am a plain warner to you:
He said, 'O my people, I am unto you a clear warner,
He said: O my people! Lo! I am a plain warner unto you
[Noah] said, "My people! I am but a plain warner to you,
He said: O my people! verily I am Unto you a warner manifest.
He said, ‘O my people! Indeed, I am a manifest warner to you.
He said: "O my People! I am to you a Warner, clear and open:
He said: "O my people! Verily, I am a plain warner to you,
He said: 'My nation, I am a clear warner for you.
He said, “O my people, I am to you a clear warner.
He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,
[71:2] He said, ‘O my people, I am indeed a plain warner to you, one whose warning is plain,
(He said: my people! Lo! I am a plain warner unto you) I am a warning messenger unto you, addressing you in a language you understand.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ } أضافهم إلى نفسه وناداهم؛ ليقبلوا إليه، ويهتدوا بهدايته وإرشاده { إِنِّي لَكُمْ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ } [نوح: 2] ظاهر الإنذار والتخويف بإذن العليم الحكيم، أرسلني ربي
